CodeClear.​NaturalDocs.​Engine.​SQLite.​API
public static
CodeClear.​NaturalDocs.​Engine.​SQLite.​API

A C# interface to selected SQLite API functions.  See http://​www​.sqlite​.org​/capi3ref​.html for descriptions of the functions and result codes.

Types
Result
public enum Result : int

public enum OpenOption : int

public enum DestructorOption : int
